snippet: The mysterious deaths of millions of bats in the United States and Canada over the past several years were caused by a fungus from Europe, scientists reported Monday.
abstract: Scientists report in the Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences that the mysterious deaths of millions of bats in the United States and Canada since 2006 were caused by a fungus from Europe.
lead_paragraph: The mysterious deaths of millions of bats in the United States and Canada over the past several years were caused by a fungus from Europe, scientists reported Monday.

headline.main: Bat Deaths Are Traced to Fungus From Europe
headline.print_headline: Bat Deaths Are Traced To Fungus From Europe

keywords.value: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences
keywords.name: organizations
